long_description: The SKS Grand D.A.D. (dual adjust dirtboard) front fender is made for mountain bikers who love sludge and mud! New 2-part quick-release dirtboard fits nearly all forks and is simple to mount. Grand D.A.D. offers optimal dirt protection due to its extra-wide size and high-quality, dual-compound plastic. Rear board consists of a softer component so wheel contact is not a problem in extreme conditions. 2-point angle adjustment ensures an optimal frame fit. Mounts easily to fork crown; all hardware is included.
short_description: The SKS Grand D.A.D. (dual adjust dirtboard) front fender is made for mountain bikers who love sludge and mud! New 2-part quick-release dirtboard fits nearly all forks and is simple to mount.
